title: Dev Ui unavailable without resteasy or resteasy-reactive

labels.name: triage/wontfix
labels.description: This will not be worked on

body:
### Describe the bug

If you write a consumer for one of the message based brokers (mqtt, rabbitmq, ...) one should not need the resteasy(-reactive) extension to see the dev ui.

### Expected behavior

Dev UI should start

### Actual behavior

Dev UI is not started without one of quarkus-resteasy or quarkus-resteasy-reactive

### How to Reproduce?

https://code.quarkus.io/?b=GRADLE_KOTLIN_DSL&e=smallrye-reactive-messaging-mqtt&e=scheduler&S=io.quarkus.platform%3A3.0&extension-search=resteasy


Note this also is the case with the 2.x line.

### Output of `uname -a` or `ver`

_No response_

### Output of `java -version`

_No response_

### GraalVM version (if different from Java)

_No response_
